name: Super Floral Thowdown
description:
Super Floral Throwdown (EX Turbo Championship Edition) is my entry for Ludum Dare 34. It's pretty short, pretty silly, and probably broken. Oh well.

X and A on the keyboard do everything. For menus, X is change/next, and A is select/confirm.

L and I can be used for player 2.

Controllers should also work (possibly).
